description: Schema defining the status of a Submission. Should only be modified by competition admins.
name: SubmissionStatus

id.description: The unique, immutable Synapse ID of this Submission.

etag.description: Synapse employs an Optimistic Concurrency Control (OCC) scheme to handle concurrent updates. Since the E-Tag changes every time an entity is updated it is used to detect when a client's current representation of an entity is out-of-date.

modifiedOn.description: The date on which Submission was created.
modifiedOn.title: Created On

status.description: The current status of this Submission.
status.name: Status
